name.title: name
name.description: (Required) Specifies the Name of the Marketplace Image this Virtual Machine should be created from. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

product.title: product
product.description: (Required) Specifies the Product of the Marketplace Image this Virtual Machine should be created from. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: (Required) Specifies the Publisher of the Marketplace Image this Virtual Machine should be created from. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
